Description: Neck and rim of black-figure painted pottery neck-amphora. Neck: A and B bear lotus-palmette cross. Shoulder: tongues in compartments. Purple on base of lotus flowers and palmettes and on crossbars; on alternate tongues; on lip as on I; on neck, ring.
Curator's comments: Possibly a member of the Tyrrhenian group (Venit 1982, p.223). There are several similar fragments from Tell Dafana in Philadelphia (CVA 8, p.58).
Bibliographic references: CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (Pl. GB 607,2)
Petrie 1888 / Tanis. Part II. Nebesheh (Am) and Defenneh (Tahpanhes) (pl. xxxi, 4)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 14)
